mapper.insert: insert into qna(qna_num, pd_num, user_id, title, content) values(QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{pd_num},#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where pd_num=#{pd_num} and user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.delete: delete qna where pd_num=#{pd_num} and user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from qna where pd_num=#{pd_num}
select * from qna where user_id=#{user_id} and pd_num=#{pd_num}
